name: Ship Scavenger 2020
description:
Your ship has blown up and you're left with only an engine. Travel around the asteroid field collecting and putting your ship back together along the way. Search for your star drive to escape and return back home. 

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 around the theme "Out of Control". The player has to regain controls for their ship as they put it back together. The player also has to adapt to their ship's configuration as the new parts get attached randomly.

How to Play:

  • WASD - Move Character
  • Space - Zoom Out/Zoom In 
  • E - Interact with Current Functional Room

Made by:

  • Alain Sangalang
  • Daniel MacCormick
  • Kody Wood
